item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, December 4, 2024 at 11:15 AM UTC
item.description:

26. Making AWS News stupid fast with smart caching (28 points | 3 comments)

29. Voice Activity Detection in Elixir with Membran (31 points | 1 comment)
